# position

**Instance Property**

The position of the node in its parent’s coordinate system.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var position: CGPoint { get set }
```

```swift
var position: CGPoint { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `(0.0,0.0)`.
